alert.note: Alert for Ferry (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 20 at 2:01PM PDT until May 20 at 2:30PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: The National Weather Service in Spokane has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Ferry County in northeastern Washington... * Until 230 PM PDT. * At 200 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 16 miles northwest of Sherman Pass moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained spotter confirmed quarter size hail 3 miles west of Malo. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Malo. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
